name: 2024 the 9th International Conference on Image, Vision and Computing
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included in ICIVC 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services.
